decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Prior to the commencement of the development to which this permission relates, a demolition management plan (which shall consider the method of demolition and the means of removing waste material from the site) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved plan.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers and in the interests of highway safety, in accordance with policies D3 and T4 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012. This condition must be a pre-commencement condition in order to beeffective.

Prior to the commencement of the development to which this permission relates, details of how the retained parts of the garages (i.e. the boundary walls) will be retained and made structurally sound shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved details. Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.This condition must be a pre-commencement condition in order to be effective.

The works required to implement the development to which this permission relates shall only be carried out between the following hours:0800 to 1800 Monday to Friday0800 to 1300 on SaturdaysFor the avoidance of doubt, no such work shall be carried out on Sundays or bank holidays.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to the benefical occupation of the development (car park) hereby approved, the applicant shall submit a Car Park Management Plan for the approval of the local planning authority. The carpark shall only be used in accordance with the approved management plan.Reason: To ensure the provision of adequate off-street parking in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policies T4 and T6 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Demolition of garages and converting the space into car parking spaces, including thermoplastic car park markings
